item.description:
The Sages of RPG Gaming Group and Crackskull's Coffee & Books present another Gamenight of epic proportions.

This will be our Fourth Gamenight at Crackskulls and will be focusing on designer board and card games once again. With designer board & card games the game designer gets front billing on the box just like the author of a book!

We will sample some of the best designer games, and I will bring along some crowd favorites from our last Crackskull's Meetup!

If there is a specific game you would like to know about, or try please let me know and I will do my best to bring it along.

We will be starting the evening at 6:00pm and going until 8:30pm.

Hope you can join us for another fantastic Crackskull's Game Night!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the people playing games in the front area.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Game Night at Crackskulls IV
